verses.roman:
nitya yāi' dekhi muñi tāṅhāra caraṇe
sphūrti-jñāne teṅho tāhā satya nāhi māne

synonyms: nitya yāi'-going daily; dekhi—see; muñi—I; tāṅhāra caraṇe—her lotus feet; sphūrti-jñāne—feeling My appearance; teṅho—she; tāhā—that; satya nāhi māne—does not accept as true.
translation: "Indeed, I go there daily to see her lotus feet. She is able to feel My presence, although she does not believe it to be true.
